title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 602.4 - Action on permit applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 602.4 - Action on permit applications

State Regulations
(a) The department may grant or deny a
permit, or grant a permit with conditions or restrictions. At its discretion, the department may issue limited or revocable permits. (b) The permit issued pursuant to this
section authorizes only the installation of the proposed well or wells. The
permittee must obtain the department's approval of the completed project
pursuant to section
602.5
of this Part before placing
the well or wells into operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
602.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
